basics.name: Achim Christ
basics.label: Master Certified Technical Specialist
basics.summary: I am a Master Certified Technical Specialist at IBM. In this role I am leading complex infrastructure modernization projects for the most innovative companies around the globe, to help them get the most out of their IBM Storage solutions.__break__I use my deep technical knowledge for enabling customers, business partners, and fellow IBM architects to build hybrid cloud infrastructure for high-performance Big Data and Machine Learning use cases. I successfully led international teams, helped launch new technologies, and expanded into new market segments. Furthermore, I am training instructor, conference speaker, and author of numerous books, papers and articles.__break__I love to dig into customer problems and solve them with cutting-edge technology. This calls to all my passions; it incorporates curiosity, creativity, and problem solving. My specialties include quickly learning new skills, staying on top of industry trends, automating and monitoring complex systems, and applying DevOps principles to foster continuous improvement.__break__I am a graduate of RheinMain University of Applied Sciences, where I majored in Computer Science. I currently live in Mainz, Germany, with my wife and my son. When I'm not exploring new technology, you can find me listening to podcasts, taking pictures, cycling, or running.

work.summary: As senior technical specialist for IBM Systems I'm helping international clients deploy and efficiently manage smart infrastructure solutions. I’m heading service development, delivery and training for various strategic IBM Storage products across EMEA. I am an expert on software defined storage and scale-out file solutions, currently focusing on automation and cloud orchestration. Furthermore, I am technical lead for a group of 8 senior specialists.
highlights: 2019: Lab Services Award for demonstrating the practice: Put the client first
2017: Lab Services Award for demonstrating the practice: Share expertise

2011: Lab Service Award for: Delivery excellence in the development & execution of IBM Information Archive services with superior customer satisfaction feedback

work.summary: As Lab Services CTO for IBM Storage I'm developing and pioneering the EMEA team's strategic technical direction. I'm assessing new technology trends to ensure that 80+ consultants' skills are aligned to support customers in a dynamically-evolving space. I'm liaising with senior leadership to replicate best practices among 9 markets in Europe, Middle East & Africa.
